languages.text: "Ты прав{mf||а}, элантах. Время течет сквозь пальцы, словно песок. Его заслуживают лишь те, у кого еще есть шанс на спасение. Идем же".

traits.locale_text: "Ты прав{mf||а}, элантах. Время течет сквозь пальцы, словно песок. Его заслуживают лишь те, у кого еще есть шанс на спасение. Идем же".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "You are right, elantach. Time slips like sand through our fingers. It is owed only to those who still have a chance to be saved. Come."
languages.original_text: "Ты прав{mf||а}, элантах. Время течет сквозь пальцы, словно песок. Его заслуживают лишь те, у кого еще есть шанс на спасение. Идем же".

traits.locale_text: "You are right, elantach. Time slips like sand through our fingers. It is owed only to those who still have a chance to be saved. Come."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are right, elantach. Time slips like sand through our fingers. It is owed only to those who still have a chance to be saved. Come."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are right, elantach. Time slips like sand through our fingers. It is owed only to those who still have a chance to be saved. Come."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are right, elantach. Time slips like sand through our fingers. It is owed only to those who still have a chance to be saved. Come."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are right, elantach. Time slips like sand through our fingers. It is owed only to those who still have a chance to be saved. Come."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Tienes razón, elantach. El tiempo se escurre como la arena entre los dedos, y solo ha de dedicarse a quienes aún tengan esperanza. Vamos».
languages.original_text: "You are right, elantach. Time slips like sand through our fingers. It is owed only to those who still have a chance to be saved. Come."

traits.locale_text: «Tienes razón, elantach. El tiempo se escurre como la arena entre los dedos, y solo ha de dedicarse a quienes aún tengan esperanza. Vamos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたの言う通りだ、エランタ。時は指からこぼれ落ちる砂のように過ぎていく。まだ救える者たちを見捨ててはならない。行こう」
languages.original_text: "You are right, elantach. Time slips like sand through our fingers. It is owed only to those who still have a chance to be saved. Come."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの言う通りだ、エランタ。時は指からこぼれ落ちる砂のように過ぎていく。まだ救える者たちを見捨ててはならない。行こう」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “你说得没错，外界人。时间正像沙子一样从指缝间溜走，我们必须拯救那些还有救的人。来吧。”
languages.original_text: "You are right, elantach. Time slips like sand through our fingers. It is owed only to those who still have a chance to be saved. Come."

traits.locale_text: “你说得没错，外界人。时间正像沙子一样从指缝间溜走，我们必须拯救那些还有救的人。来吧。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Vous avez raison, elantach. Le temps nous glisse entre les doigts tel du sable. Il n'est dû qu'à ceux qui ont encore une chance d'être sauvés. Venez. »
languages.original_text: "You are right, elantach. Time slips like sand through our fingers. It is owed only to those who still have a chance to be saved. Come."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison, elantach. Le temps nous glisse entre les doigts tel du sable. Il n'est dû qu'à ceux qui ont encore une chance d'être sauvés. Venez. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt recht, Elantach. Die Zeit gleitet uns wie Sand durch unsere Finger. Wir sollten sie nur für diejenigen einsetzen, die noch gerettet werden können. Kommt."
languages.original_text: "You are right, elantach. Time slips like sand through our fingers. It is owed only to those who still have a chance to be saved. Come."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt recht, Elantach. Die Zeit gleitet uns wie Sand durch unsere Finger. Wir sollten sie nur für diejenigen einsetzen, die noch gerettet werden können. Kommt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Haklısın elantach. Zaman, avucumuza aldığımız kum misali akıp gidiyor. Zamanımızı yalnızca hâlâ kurtarılma şansı olanlara harcamalıyız. Hadi."
languages.original_text: "You are right, elantach. Time slips like sand through our fingers. It is owed only to those who still have a chance to be saved. Come."

traits.locale_text: "Haklısın elantach. Zaman, avucumuza aldığımız kum misali akıp gidiyor. Ona yalnızca hâlâ kurtarılma şansı olanlar sahiptir. Hadi."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
